CustomRoomListerclass

Details

A simple customizable room lister. This can be used to create custom listers for things like remote room contents listings. We act just like any ordinary room lister, but we use custom prefix and suffix strings provided during construction. `class `**`CustomRoomLister`**` :   `[`Lister`](../object/Lister.html)
